task: Fix native app links opening in browser
message: Fixed 'Open in native app' setting not working for album links. Links were using target='_blank' unconditionally and not passing useNativeApp to URL generation. Now albums open in Apple Music/Spotify app when setting is enabled. Production live with commit df84420.

deployed_changes.summary: Fix native app links opening in browser instead of app
features: Album links now respect 'Open in native app' setting
target='_blank' only applied for web URLs, not app URLs (music://, spotify://)
Fixed in both sidebar album grid and timeline popup

key_decisions: Pass useNativeApp parameter to getAlbumUrl() for correct URL scheme
Use spread syntax to conditionally apply target='_blank'
Keep target='_blank' for web URLs to prevent navigation away from app
context.testing_done: Build successful, deployed to production, health check passed

notes: SPOTIFY REDIRECT ISSUE: Use http://127.0.0.1:3000 instead of http://localhost:3000.
